title: Ep 110 | Phil Breaks Quarantine, the Guy Who Kept Cursing God, and Jase Shares Jesus with a Nurse
description:
After quarantining for months, Phil finally heads back to town. Phil is also dealing with beavers, bears, and gators, and he comes up with another good reason to avoid the beach. Jase has a curious experience at a traffic roundabout and finds a way to share Jesus during an insurance appointment. Phil tells the story of what happened to the customer who called him and cursed God over and over. And Jase has a strong reaction to PC culture.

Pre-order Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson: http://jesuspoliticsbook.com

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
 
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
 
To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
